name: Space Dunks
description:
Product Description:

Travel through space and defend your home planet's honor by defeating rival planet's in 1 versus 1 basketball. Rules are simple. 90 seconds to a match. Tie or High Score advances. Can you beat all four planets?

Instruction Manual:

  • Space Bar to shoot / jump
  • Alt+F4 close (changing soon
  • WASD movement
